entry.title: Increase response rate with predictive analytics
entry.summary:
Description

We have recently taken over 3mil SMS inbound and outbound text messages and used predictive techniques to increase the user response rate to outbound messaging.

The talk will include data wrangling, AWS / Jupyter set-up, feature creation and extraction and various machine learning techniques and there application to the business problem.

entry.title: Building a social network content recommendation service using Factorisation machines
entry.summary:
Description

Rasa.io are a community management platform. They wanted to build a service which would generate a personalised content feed based on both user commentary and external news feeds. We have use python and a factorisation machines framework to create a service which there platform could call to generate a personalised feed
